# v2.1.0 Release Documentation

This directory contains working documentation for the v2.1.0 release (February 8, 2026).

## Release Notes

- **RELEASE-v2.1.0.md** - Official release note (clean format)
- **RELEASE_NOTES_v2.1.0.md** - Detailed user-facing release notes
- **GITHUB_RELEASE_v2.1.0.md** - GitHub release page content
- **CHANGELOG_ENTRY_v2.1.0.md** - CHANGELOG.md entry (already merged into main CHANGELOG.md)
- **RELEASE_MESSAGES_v2.1.0.md** - Announcement templates (9 versions)

## Issue Management

- **RESPOND_TO_ISSUES_NOW.md** - Copy-paste ready responses for GitHub issues
- **ISSUE_RESPONSES.md** - Detailed responses for Issues #24, #26, #27, #30
- **ISSUE_MANAGEMENT_PLAN.md** - Complete issue organization strategy
- **ISSUE_ACTION_CHECKLIST.md** - Step-by-step implementation guide

## PR Closure

- **PR28_CLOSING_COMMENT.md** - Closing comment for PR #28 (superseded)
- **PR28_CLOSING_VERSIONS.md** - Alternative versions of the closing comment

## Quick Access

**Post to GitHub Issues:**
1. Open [RESPOND_TO_ISSUES_NOW.md](RESPOND_TO_ISSUES_NOW.md)
2. Follow copy-paste instructions for each issue

**Create GitHub Release:**
1. Go to: https://github.com/unicef-drp/unicefData/releases/new
2. Tag: `v2.1.0` (already created)
3. Title: `v2.1.0 - Cross-Language Testing & Quality Improvements`
4. Body: Copy from [GITHUB_RELEASE_v2.1.0.md](GITHUB_RELEASE_v2.1.0.md)

## Status

- ✅ v2.1.0 tag created
- ✅ All tests passing
- ⏳ GitHub issues need responses (see RESPOND_TO_ISSUES_NOW.md)
- ⏳ PR #28 needs closing (see PR28_CLOSING_COMMENT.md)
- ⏳ GitHub release page needs publishing
